altTitles.ja: とんがり帽子のアトリエ

description.en:
A girl in a small village, Coco, always wanted to be a wizard.   
But those who cannot use magic since birth cannot become wizards, so she had given up her dream of becoming one. However, one day, a magician visited the village · This is the story of despair and hope that visited the girl.  
  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.  


---

**Officially licensed:**  
- In English by Kodansha as "Witch Hat Atelier"  
- Indonesian by Elex Media as "Atelier of Witch Hat"  
- In German by [Egmont Manga](https://www.egmont-manga.de/buch-buchreihe/atelier-of-witch-hat/) as "Atelier of Witch Hat"  
- In Spanish by [Milky Way Ediciones](https://www.milkywayediciones.com/collections/all/atelier-of-witch-hat) as "Atelier of Witch Hat"  
- In French by [Pika](http://www.pika.fr/catalogue/pika-seinen/latelier-des-sorciers-29927) as "L'Atelier des Sorciers"  
- In Italian by [Panini Comics](http://comics.panini.it/store/pub_ita_it/catalogsearch/result/?q=Atelier+of+Witch+Hat) as "Atelier of Witch Hat"  
- In Brazilian Portuguese by [Panini Comics](https://loja.panini.com.br/panini/produto/Manga-Atelier-of-Witch-Hat-1.aspx) as "Atelier of Witch Hat"  
- In Polish by [Kotori](http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/atelier-spiczastych-kapeluszy/) as "Atelier spiczastych kapeluszy"  
- In Russian by [Истари Комикс](https://istaricomics.com/katalog-knig/manga/atel_e_koldovskih_kolpakov/) as "Ателье колдовских колпаков"  
- In Ukrainian by [Nasha Idea](https://nashaidea.com/product-category/%d0%b0%d1%82%d0%b5%d0%bb%d1%8c%d1%94-%d1%87%d0%b0%d0%ba%d0%bb%d1%83%d0%bd%d1%81%d1%8c%d0%ba%d0%b8%d1%85-%d0%ba%d0%b0%d0%bf%d0%b5%d0%bb%d1%8e%d1%85%d1%96%d0%b2/) as "Ательє чаклунських капелюхів"  
- In Korean by Haksan Media as "고깔모자의 아틀리에"
